snippet.title: Gleamlight - 1st Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a story of light - of Gleam, in a world of glass stained in darkness.
Side-scrolling action adventure game "Gleamlight"
Coming 2020 to #NintendoSwitch #PS4 #XboxOne & #Steam !

Official Website: https://www.d3p.co.jp/gleamlight/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gleamlight_en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gleamlight.official/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gleamlight.official/

©2020 DICO CO.,Ltd. ©2020 D3 PUBLISHER
